text: poslidovnyky skazhut聞 yikhnim lideram, "Tse buly vy kotri zamyslyly nich ta den聞, todi nakazaly nam buty unappreciative BOHA, ta shchob vstanovyty idoliv vyshykuvatysya z Nym." Vony budut聞 yikhatysya z remorse, koly vony bachat聞 retribution, dlya my rozmistymo kaydany navkolo shyy tsykh khto disbelieved. Vony ne spravedlyvo requited za shcho vony
